result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Judicial Pretrial - in court on November 15, 2022 at 11:40 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Mario Rios-Bonilla
Current: 226142 County Road F, Colby, WI 54421 United States  (Effective: 08-09-2022)
Prior: 226142 County Road F, Athens, WI 54411

No contact with victim(s): I.G. Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney. No Bars, Taverns, Liquor Stores or Beer Tents. Absolute sobriety from, and no possession of alcohol.  Shall have his/her fingerprints and photograph taken at the Sheriff's Dept.

Clerk: Amanda.
Case called at 2:59 pm.
State appears by ADA Hannah Boeck; Defendant FAILS to appear;  Attorney Carly Fish appears via zoom. 
Date and Time set for IA; VRCW. 

Atty Fish given permission to appear on behalf of defendant. 
Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 

PLEA: NOT GUILTY. 
I.G. makes statement. 

COURT ORDERS: $500 sig bond - CONDITIONS: 
- No contact with victim(s): I.G. Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney. 
- No Bars, Taverns, Liquor Stores, or Beer Tents. 
- Absolute sobriety from, and no possession of alcohol. 
- Prints and photograph.
